articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: European iPad users can soon download apps from third-party stores - The Verge
articles.description: Apple will let iPad users in the European Union download apps from alternative app marketplaces starting on September 16th, coinciding with the release of iPadOS 18.
articles.content:
European iPad users can soon download apps from third-party stores

articles.author: Anthony Deutsch, Tom Balmforth
articles.title: Exclusive: Russia produces kamikaze drone with Chinese engine - Reuters
articles.description: Russia started producing a new long-range attack drone called the Garpiya-A1 last year using Chinese engines and parts, which it has deployed in the war in Ukraine, according to two sources from a European intelligence agency and documents seen by Reuters.

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Rocket Report: China leaps into rocket reuse; 19 people are currently in orbit - Ars Technica
articles.description: Launch startups in China and Europe are borrowing ideas and rhetoric from SpaceX.
